FunnelInsights.PluginDescription: Define, track, and analyze visitor paths (funnels) towards a specific conversion goal or flow.
FunnelInsights.ActiveHelp: Only active funnels are displayed in reports. Inactive funnels are hidden but their configuration is preserved.
FunnelInsights.GoalFilterNone: No Goal â€” Track all visitors
FunnelInsights.GoalFilterHelp: When a goal is selected, ONLY visits that converted this goal will be included in the funnel analysis. This is useful when you want to analyze the path of successful conversions only. If no goal is selected, ALL visitors matching the funnel steps will be tracked, regardless of whether they converted.
FunnelInsights.GoalFilterWarning: When filtering by goal: if no visitors have converted this goal yet, the funnel will show 0 entries.
FunnelInsights.StepsHelp: Define the sequence of pages or actions that make up this funnel. Visitors will be tracked as they progress through these steps.
FunnelInsights.RequiredStepHelp: When enabled, visitors MUST complete this step to proceed in the funnel. If they skip this step, they will exit the funnel. Use this for critical steps that cannot be bypassed.
FunnelInsights.StrictModeHelp: When enabled, visitors must follow the EXACT sequence without visiting any other pages between steps. Any deviation (visiting a page not in the funnel) will end their funnel journey. Disable this to allow visitors to browse freely between funnel steps.
FunnelInsights.TimeLimitHelp: Maximum time (in seconds) allowed between steps. If a visitor takes longer than this to move to the next step, their progress will not count. Set to 0 for unlimited time. Example: 300 = 5 minutes between steps.
FunnelInsights.ValidateHelp: Enter a URL, page title, or event value to test which step it would match. This helps verify your step configuration before saving.
FunnelInsights.NoFunnelsFound: No funnels have been created yet.
FunnelInsights.NoFunnelsFoundHelp: Create your first funnel to start analyzing how visitors navigate through your conversion paths.
FunnelInsights.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this funnel? This action cannot be undone and all historical data for this funnel will be lost.
FunnelInsights.EntriesHelp: Number of visitors who entered the funnel at this step.
FunnelInsights.ProceededHelp: Number of visitors who moved from this step to the next step.
FunnelInsights.DropOffHelp: Number of visitors who left the funnel at this step without proceeding.
FunnelInsights.TopDropOffsHelp: Pages that visitors went to after dropping off at this step.
FunnelInsights.TotalConversionsHelp: Visitors who completed all funnel steps.
FunnelInsights.ConversionRateHelp: Percentage of visitors who entered the funnel and completed all steps.
FunnelInsights.NoDataForPeriod: No funnel data available for the selected period. This could mean no visitors matched the funnel steps during this time, or the funnel was recently created.
FunnelInsights.NoDataWithGoal: No data yet. This funnel is filtered by a goal. Ensure visitors are converting the associated goal, or remove the goal filter to track all visitors.
FunnelInsights.SelectFunnelToView: Select a funnel below to view detailed step-by-step analytics.
FunnelInsights.NoActiveFunnelsHelp: Create your first funnel to start tracking how visitors navigate through your conversion paths.
FunnelInsights.StepConditionsHelp: A step matches when ANY of its conditions are met (OR logic). Add multiple conditions to match different paths to the same step.
FunnelInsights.NoVisitorsForPeriod: No visitors found for the selected period that matched the funnel steps.
